articles.title: 'America's Got Talent' contestant Nightbirde dies after cancer battle - CNN Philippines
articles.description: Nightbirde caught the attention of many after delivering a stunning audition last year on 'America's Got Talent.' During her performance, she disclosed to the judges that she was battling cancer that had spread to her lungs, spine, and liver.

articles.title: Colombia's highest court legalizes abortion up to 24 weeks - World News - Castanet.net
articles.description: Colombia became the latest country in Latin America to expand access to abortion Monday as the nation’s Constitutional Court voted to legalize the procedure until the 24th week of pregnancy.
articles.content:
